title: Banned ?
body:
I'm writing this message as my game tries to reconnect  idk how, but I do I get banned if the game doesn't manage to reconnect somehow? 
I know it sounds weird but its happening.

replies.body: Can you describe the events that led up to what you're seeing? Are you certain this isn't the known issue listed in the In-Client ticker (top-left of client next to Home button) and on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)?
Sry it doesn't help or support anyone, but I cloud need some from someone else pls.
